title: In the Age of AI – A Panel Discussion with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at TU Berlin
description:
The Age of AI – A Recording of the Panel Discussion with Sam Altman at TU Berlin on 7 February 2025

The discussion explored the impact of AI on science, business, and society. What do students, scientists, and politicians need to prepare for in the age of AI? What are the opportunities from this transformative technology. What are the risks we need to consider? What prerequisites do we need to establish, to ensure AI benefits society?

This event was hosted by Technische Universität Berlin, OpenAI, and the Berlin Institute for the Foundations of Learning and Data (BIFOLD).

ℹ️ More information: https://www.tu.berlin/en/go278788/

Can't get enough of science? Then take a look at our new Newsroom - the beating heart of science communication of TU Berlin. It brings together press releases, interviews, lab insights, and much more in one place.
